title: Price Check
description:
This app is a quick way to scan a product bar code to look up prices and visit product pages for Amazon™, Walmart.com™, eBay™, and Google™.

★ Check prices and availability
★ Look up products for quick reorder
★ Open product pages and view details
★ Scan prices in-store (get a discount with price matching!)
★ Use history feature as a reference
★ Streamline your online shopping

Easy to use:

• Scan a UPC bar code. Product info/prices show up
• Tap for more info!

Also:

• This app talks directly to the retailers' systems, so prices are more up to date than on other apps
• Works with both apps and websites
• No registration or login needed
• No annoying notifications

Happy shopping!

WALMART.COM℠ is a service mark of Wal-Mart.com USA, LLC and Wal-Mart Stores, Inc.

title: ShopSavvy - Barcode Scanner & Price Comparison
description:
The best price comparison, barcode scanning and product search app. 

The original Barcode Scanner and price checker.  Find stores near you with the product in stock and at the best price.  Coverage of all top retailers so you can find the lowest price fast, easy and free.
  
With ShopSavvy Barcode Scanner and QR Code reader you can:

-- Search for any product via UPC code, barcode and keyword.  
-- Barcode Scan any product and compare all the best prices on the Internet and at nearby, local stores.  
-- Save money with price comparison and product search for any product or retailer.
--  Price Match- we'll even help you drop the price at the register using the store's own price match policy.
-- Scan QR codes.  
-- First and Best Barcode Scanner

With ShopSavvy you will save you money and never miss a deal! You can search by product name or barcode scan any item. Lighting fast barcode scanner and product search.  

Price comparison or QR Code Scan and Save!

We have the largest database of retailers, products and prices including Amazon, Best Buy, Target, and Walmart.  Great for price checking at Walmart, Best Buy and Kohls!

"In the past I've relied mostly on the ShopSavvy app"
- New York Times

"ShopSavvy has become a secret weapon of sorts for bargain hunters"
- The Washington Post

"A must-have for professional bargain hunters"
- Time

"In addition to comparing prices, ShopSavvy makes it easy to purchase items from select websites"
- The Wall Street Journal

"ShopSavvy was one of the best early Android applications"
- TechCrunch

title: Price Cruncher - Price Compare
description:
Are you trying to get on top of your expenses?  Find it difficult to compare prices at the grocery store while on the go?

Is it cheaper to buy 152 diapers for $35 or 72 diapers on sale for $19.95?
Is that 20kg package of dog food from Costco really a good deal compared to the 2kg bag at the Walmart?
How much are you paying for each sheet in a paper towel roll?

Wish you could figure out all this information easily from your shopping list?

Price Cruncher is a price comparison shopping list tool that allows you to save your favorite items and price compare prices on a per unit price basis.  It has built in unit conversions to convert prices prior to comparison as well as a discount calculator tool.

Price Comparison Features:
- Compare Prices with different units of measure.  Can accommodate for volume, weight, length, and area.
- Allow user to add custom units to suit their own needs (eg. rolls, boxes, sheets, etc.)
- Support for bulk purchase comparisons (eg. Costco multiple items packaged together for sale)
- View Price History for any of your Items
- Add and Maintain Items for future price comparison
- Categorize Items
- Discount Calculator
- Quick Price Compare
- Add/Save Multiple Prices
- Manage Stores
- Add all your items to a shopping list
- Compare prices directly from your shopping list
- Customize shopping list to calculate estimated totals based on previous price history
- Use your purchase history to estimate your grocery costs
- Customize categories
- Export data to CSV
- Pro Users: Backup and Restore your data
- Save YOU money!

Save and compare prices on:
- Baby items
- Groceries
- Pet Supplies
- Hardware Supplies
- Alcohol
- Tobacco
- Sports items
- Cosmetics
- ANYTHING

The discount Calculator allows for quick calculation of discount prices!

Supports all currencies!  The default currency is based on your phone language settings in your Settings -> Language & Inputs > Languages.  However, if this is not working for you, you can change this via the settings menu in Price Cruncher to specify a currency.

Units currently supported for price comparison:
- Grams
- Kilograms
- Milligrams
- Ounces
- Pounds
- Gallons (US & UK)
- Fluid Ounces (US & UK)
- Quarts (US & UK)
- Pints (US & UK)
- Cubic Feet
- Liters
- Milliliters
- Feet
- Inches
- Yards
- Meters
- Centimeters
- Millimeters
- Decimeters
- Square Feet
- Square Inches
- Square Yards
- Square Meters
- Square Centimeters
- Square Millimeters
- Square Decimeters
- Asian units (Candareen, Catty, Tael, Picul, Mace)
- Create your own custom units (eg. Sheets, roll, can, anything you can think of!)

If you like Price Cruncher, the ultimate price comparison app, please rate us favorably!

summary: Price Cruncher is a shopping list tool that makes it easy to compare unit prices
comments: This is free so I don't mind any of the shortcomings mentioned in other reviews - and I only notice a few minor things that need improvement. This is a real help when I'm shopping in-store or checking various sales flyers. Say what you want, but I'm just glad there are people talented enough to write these apps and generous enough to put them up for no charge.
Exactly what I want for tracking grocery prices. Easy to use, not a lot of fuss, tracks lowest prices and stores.

I love this app. Would've given 5 stars but it lacks a space for notes when we are crunching a new price. Sometimes I'd like to add 3x2, or something like special Sale. There's no place fpr that unless one creates it as a new product
Pretty useful for keeping track of the best price for a given product. The quick comparison feature is useful too. Biggest flaw is that you can't edit the prices if the store changes it.
A very useful app. It only needs a few additions to get five stars from me: More currencies (CzK), Make custom units save able so I don't have to reenter them every time.

title: Compare Prices On Amazon & eBay - Barcode Scanner
description:
☆ The ultimate price comparison tool for eBay and Amazon – scan and save on millions of items! ☆

With our powerful barcode reader for Amazon Shopping and eBay, you’ll have instant access to ratings, reviews and prices for products you see in-store. Find amazing discounts, save money and get the best price possible. 

★ SIMPLE TO USE
Simply find a product and use the barcode reader to scan the item. The app will instantly bring up the same item on eBay and Amazon so you can compare prices and access reviews and ratings, helping you make a better decision and make you a smarter shopper!
Like the item? You can order it directly from the app! 

★ FIND THE BEST PRICE
Shopping around for a product can be tiresome. Good news – it doesn’t have to be! 
Using the price comparison tool, you’ll be able to save money on lots of items you find in-store. By not only comparing the price on Amazon, but on eBay too, you can be sure that you’re getting the best price possible on your product. 

★ MAKE SMART PURCHASES
If you’re unsure whether a product is worth the money, you can use our barcode scanner and price comparison tool to access reviews and ratings from genuine product users. When you scan your product and open up the Amazon and eBay pages, you’ll be able to instantly see reviews to help you make a decision. 
Save yourself the stress of purchasing a poor quality item – check the reviews! 

★ COMPARE PRICES OF MILLIONS OF ITEMS
With instant access to Amazon and eBay’s entire inventory, you can compare prices of almost any product! By comparing in-store prices against two of the internet’s cheapest retailers, you’re guaranteed to save lots of your hard-earned cash!

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
PRICE COMPARISON FOR AMAZON & EBAY - HIGHLIGHTS
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
• Scan barcodes and view the product on eBay and Amazon simultaneously in seconds
• Find deals, discounts and savings on millions of products
• Use the barcode scanner as a quick, mobile price comparison tool 
• Search and shop for items on directly from the app 
• View honest ratings and reviews for any item you scan

★ PRICE COMPARISON MADE EASY – DOWNLOAD FREE TODAY ★

---
This app was not created or endorsed by Amazon.

summary: Scan barcodes and compare the prices with eBay & Amazon. Over 450 million items!
recentChanges:
Special thanks for using Compare Prices for Amazon & eBay. Enjoy this comprehensive price comparison.
We would be very happy about a 5-star rating.
comments: Open app, AD. Scan item, it works. Pulls up amazon and ebay, but when i click filters tap on the ebay tab it does nothing. Ok whatever. Go to scan new item, AD with LOUD AUDIO, for 15 seconds. Oh no, it didnt scan right, go to rescan, AD again. I back out and just go to ebay to search. Decided to scan one more thing, guess what it makes me finish that AD i backed out of. So in total, one search worked one didnt (i wont rule out me being at fault) but i spent 3x more time watching ads in store.

Every. Single. Scan. Means you have to look at an ad, leave the screen to look at another product? Ad, want to compare to a different store, Ad. No way to delete items or make a list so you have to scroll through everything you have ever scanned. Don't bother with this.
Paid for it to get rid of ads. Need to have a clear button on searches instead of going to setting. Apps then clear cashe.
Good app, but the last 5 barcodes I scanned only gave me prices on Amazon, not on ebay, so hard to compare...
Only had for one day, but used it several times. Very good app.

title: The Smartest Price Tracker for Amazon - Pricepulse
description:
Get Ready to Save when Shopping on Amazon.

Track items you want to watch. Get price drop notifications..

Import Amazon Wishlists, Search items, discover hot deals.

The best price tracker for Amazon!


-----


Did  you know that 95% of products on Amazon change their prices constantly?  You can save on all your purchases by buying when prices are low.  

Pricepulse let's you, for free  track any product on Amazon and get push notifications when prices drop so you can always find the best deal.

This is the best way to save money! Save hundreds of dollars every time you shop with Pricepulse a new shopping app that instantly checks every product’s price history and determines if you’re buying it a the lowest price. 

We developed Artificial Intelligence technology to help create a price tracker that tells you the best time to buy and the best deals across million of products.

From diapers to laptops, to pet food, check Pricepulse before you buy! 

Our algorithms automatically perform amazon price checks with tremendous accuracy. After Pricepulse weighs all possible purchase options, it tells you when exactly is a good time to wait for a price drop and when the price is right and your best move is... to buy now! 

Top features:

DISCOVER the best deals *in real time* across millions of products. 

SCAN BARCODES to perform price comparison and price checks while you’re in-store shopping and get yourself a price match from retailer.

PRICE ALERTS track products and receive price alerts via push notifications the instant prices drop.
  
FORECAST with the help of Artificial Intelligence technology so you know when product prices are predicted drop.

MORE PERKS:

SAVE TIME: Pricepulse does all the price comparison work for you, meaning money is not the only thing you save!

PERSONALIZED COUPONS: having Pricepulse by your side is like having coupons for exactly what you want. 

FEEL POSITIVE:  Using Pricepulse is a guarantee you are getting the absolute best price. This way, you can consistently feel positive about your purchases while saving tons of money in the process. 


This is perfect tool for e commerce shopping. Don’t wait until Black Friday or Cyber Monday to get the best deals, they are happening now, every day!

title: SMASH - Price Finder (Price Barcode Scanner App)
description:
*SMASH - Price Finder App*

With our SMASH Price Finder App, USA/Canada shoppers can make better decisions when they are shopping by allowing them not only to price check products at the store they are in, but price comparison between vendors. Never overpay again with this amazing shopping barcode scanner tool from SMASH Inventory Solutions! With this versatile and user-friendly tool, you are able to easily find stores near you with the product in stock and at the lowest price. With this smart shopping assistant/price comparison app, you will be able to get pricing on products sold at retail outlets such as Home Depot, Lowes, Walmart, Target, Kohls, as well as online listings.

With SMASH Price Finder App you can easily:
-- Search for any product via USA/Canada UPC barcode scanner or manual barcode entry into the price checker tool.
-- Quickly, easily, and effectively price look up and compare all the best prices on the web and at nearby, local stores for a given product! 
-- Never experience buyers’ remorse by ensuring you get the best price possible on any given product by leveraging our barcode scanning price checker/price comparison tool!
-- Price Match- if you are a loyal customer of a certain retail out, you can still save by asking them to match the lowest advertised price of a comparable retailer.
-- Share feedback and app with us as well as friends – helping those close to you save more too!

The SMASH Price Finder App is easy to use, with a highly intuitive flow, and super quick barcode scanning price compare tool. Best of all, the app is completely free! So, no excuses. Shop savvy and start saving today!

***Note***

Our price checker app pulls from the largest North American Product database and will deliver the best results for USA/Canada users. There are over 274 million products in the database we pull from. Unfortunately, not every product makes it to the UPC database. Some manufacturers and distributors don't add their products to the UPC universal database to save on their product roll out. This is especially true for generic products that are sold in only one chain (Walmart brand, Kroger Brand, Home Depot Brand, etc.) Also some UPC barcodes for older products may be reused. The availability of the product in the UPC database is not in our control. Please do not leave a negative review if some of the products you scan do not exist in the database as it is not a failure of the app, but rather the failure of the product manufacturer/distributor.

Our goal with this price scanning app is to help shoppers save money on their everyday purchases and shop smarter when it is time for bigger ticket purchases. With our price comparison tool our hope is that our users will be empowered to save products to their wish list when they find competitive offers and ask for either a price match in store or purchase later for a lower price with another vendor. The Smash Price Finder/price checker app is intended for North American buyers. We are currently working on integrating new databases in order to serve users outside of North America with a global price compare app.

Price finder app
Price compare scanner
Discount finder barcode scanning
Shopping bar code scanner
Find discounts and offers
Online shopping and deals finder
Comparison shopping USA
Shopping assistant barcode scanning

title: My Price List - Simple and Easy Price List Maker
description:
My Price List is a simple solution for creating product price list for shopkeepers, retail, service and wholesale business.

In essence, a price list gives you a clear picture of cost price and sale price of the products. You can quick overview the price of your products in a tap.

My Price List can store unlimited products and creates price lists an efficient and productive part of your product sales and marketing.

My Price List has very handy and user friendly interface which is built on Native Android Technology to give you the best experience.


FEATURES:

- A price list includes Product Name, Size/Weight, Quantity, Cost Price, Sale Price, Category, Barcode and Photo

- Built-in Barcode (UPC Code) scanner

- Linear structure and visually clean product list to highlight product's detail

- Backup and Restore products to multiple devices

- Generate PDF and XLS (Excel) file to share and print

- Tap to quick view, Hold to quick edit

- Can store unlimited products

- Manage categories easily

- Add, edit, delete or share product in a few taps

- Option to change currency country-wise

- Quick product search

- Built on Native Android Technology for best user experience


NOTE: The default 4 digits PIN for 'Delete All' option is 1234.

title: Google Shopping: Discover, compare prices & buy
description:
The Google Shopping app enables you to shop millions of items across thousands of stores with confidence. Buy directly on Google with an easy and secure checkout, using your Google account.  When you buy on Google, your order is backed by a Google guarantee - with simple returns and customer support 7 days a week.

Easier shopping, all from one spot, no membership required
Whether you’re shopping for an everyday necessity, a gift, or something new and unique, you’ll find it easy to browse departments and products with the Google Shopping app. Google Shopping is free and doesn’t require a paid membership to enjoy all its benefits.

Thoughtful recommendations
Get deals and product recommendations just for you, inspired by your Google activity. 

Compare stores, prices, and more
The Google Shopping app brings thousands of stores together in one place, so you can shop your favorite places or try somewhere new. Quickly compare prices, reviews, brands, and store availability to find the best option for you - both online and nearby.

Exclusive deals and free shipping
Save time and money on the go, with app-exclusive deals and promo codes from stores. Get free shipping on qualifying orders, with most items arriving within 3-5 days. Save even more with daily deals and frequent flash sales.

Download the app now to start shopping millions of items across thousands more stores - all in one convenient place.

comments: Filters not working on Android 9 unless I open in browser. the option is displayed but it draws up a blank window after displaying an ad. It also definitely NEEDS TO default to the price of goods that have succesfully sold. 80% of the listings are 400% higher than the actual value. Funkos currently listed for 25-30 bucks but when checking in browser and filtering to only display sold items reveals they successfully sell for five or six dollars.

Used to be an OK app, but now shows too many long commercial ads a user is forced to watch. NO GOOD if you are out "in the field" trying to look up items quickly. Being forced to watch a 10 second or more ad after scanning every third or so barcode is very counter-productive to professional eBay sellers such as myself. Deleted this app to look for another scanner without these delays.
Works well with a lot of advertising but it's a free app and it doesn't have a lot of bugs.
Very helpful to get a guide on pricing. Thanks!
Good app but the ebay tab should filter to items sold, not to what sellers are asking for a product. That gives a better idea of what items are actually worth.

title: Gold & Silver Spot Price
description:
JM Bullion, the premier online bullion dealer in America, brings an exceptional precious metals app to the Android.  Watch the real-time spot price movements of silver, gold, platinum, and palladium to stay on top of the market.  Use our interactive charts to study past trends in those precious metals’ prices. Create customizable text and email alerts for when the silver price or gold price reaches set values you specify to know when the moment is right for you to invest.  Check out which items JM Bullion has on special at any given time to be certain you are spending your money sensibly.  Visit the app’s store to quickly gain access to all our silver, gold, platinum, copper, and palladium products on the JM Bullion mobile site.

Features:

• Interactive Charts for Silver, Gold, Platinum, and Palladium Spot Prices – Timeframes: 5 Years, 1 Year, 6 Months, 3 Months, 1 Month, 7 Days, & 24 Hours  

• Ability to Set Up Email & Text Price Alerts for Silver & Gold Prices using Facebook, Google+, Yahoo!, or Outlook

• Real-time Spot Price Updates for Silver, Gold, Platinum, & Palladium 

• Access Weekly On-Sale Items & Special Price-Over-Spot for Each

• Real-time Gold/Silver Ratio Updates

summary: Live price updates, customizable spot price alerts, interactive price charts.
recentChanges: Performance enhancements
comments: Great app to keep you updated on prices and price changes. Love how they keep you updated on your shipments if there's gonna be a delay they let you know ahead of time.
Pretty good app I enjoy it. However the graphs are hard to read. The gold to Silver ratio is overlapping. Follow up after using it for a little while longer. Spot price alerts do not work.
I love being able to check prices quickly and the app has worked smooth- i would like it if the alerts would be audible.
Great and easy functionality with up to the minute data. The alert feature isn't reliable though; random "expiration" and "logouts" makes alerts pointless.
Neat summay of the precious metals, with simple charts and spot prices, and no irritating pop adds. However, I miss the ability to select different foreign currencies.

title: idealo - Price Comparison & Mobile Shopping App
description:
We all know how online shopping can be very stressful. Am I paying too much for this item? Are there better options on the market? Am I getting the best deal? 
Problem solved! idealo is your shopping companion that helps you have the best experience, for FREE! 
It's your call, download now, and find discounts on the latest deals available in 6 countries: Germany, France, Austria, Italy, Spain, and the UK.

An all in one service, that takes all the stress out of online shopping and leaves you only with the best shopping experience you have ever had!
Whether you are looking for health and fitness products, tech, or garden supplies, idealo is the perfect shopping assistant to help you find and compare the best prices on the market, including the best offers from the largest online stores such as Ebay, Amazon, John Lewis, and more.

How it works:
1. Download the idealo app for free on Android.
2. Search for the best prices on things you want to buy.
3. Check the price history and set price alerts for your favourite products when they reach your desired price.
4. Get instant notifications when the prices fall
5. Order the best products online and save money and time

Enjoy the best personalised experience at a glance with idealo, a shopping paradise for all of you shopaholics, who just prefer to explore what is new in the magical shopping world, right from your sofa.

idealo is one of Europe’s leading price comparison portals. It is a free revolutionary app that makes you save time and money.
We currently have 183 million offers from 30,000 shops, so just relax and open the idealo app and start browsing for your favourite game, the latest phone or the trendiest trainers, or even pet supplies for our best friends, the animals.

At idealo, you can also find the best products and discounts in fashion, makeup and beauty products, electronics, video games, bikes, cameras, watches, and the best exercise and fitness equipment at ideal prices.

Use your phone to look for your favourite products, and take your shopping list wherever you go, for fast and easy browsing through millions of unique and affordable offers from the most popular shops.

Get started:
Download the app on Google Play Store now to start a new shopping adventure, and discover the mysteries of online shopping with the safest and easiest shopping app, idealo. It is a must-have shopping app to get the best products at the best price, and to compare deals on the go.

Our most important features:
» Product search via text or EAN with the built-in barcode scanner
» Detailed product information: fact sheets, images, videos, expert reviews and user ratings
» Wide range of filter and sorting options
» Favourites with delivery info
» Email alerts when a product reaches your target price
» Access past searches and barcode scans
» Forwarding of any offers to friends via email, WhatsApp, Facebook, Twitter or SMS / iMessage

"This has saved me a lot of money. Halfords price match and i get items at nearly half price BRILLIANT". Graeme Howe
"App of the year for me!" Anyadike Chijioke
"Straight forward app to help with buying things. Thanks, time saved at the end of the process is a blessing." David William William

Please note:
» In order to access current product data and offers, the App requires an internet connection.
» In order for the barcode scanner to function, the camera setting must be enabled in the App.
» In order to set up a user account, the App requires permission to synchronise the accounts of your devices. This function is currently only available in Germany.

Feedback & Support:
»»» If you like our app, please rate it on Play Store or via Google+ «««
»»» Help us improve the idealo app by sending your feedback to app@idealo.co.uk «««
🏬

recentChanges: » Many small improvements and bug fixes.
comments: When registering the only option is to input a German address. Maybe you are not aware that many German companies are more than happy to serve customers all over Europe?? When fixing that, please add a feature to filter by 'Ships Internationallly', so we who live outside of Germany can filter out the sellers that don't offer the option.

The only reason it gets four stars is the accuracy of some of its findings, when an advertised 2TB SSD turns out to be 250 GB on the retailers site it's frustrating. Not a direct fault of idealo but it should be easy enough to pre check the actual product details.
It's good to see that you can compare the prices and the specifications of a product. Could be even better if you could compare prices from more than a country
Untill now the best app I know to buy at low prices. It should be done better to track better cost+shipping, and maybe auctions on ebay, but is nice how it works
You could get anything from tires to electronics, and most importantly, from reliable sources! Ps. Latest update fixed the network issues.

title: Price Match Genie
description:
Do you know the easiest way to get great discount in stores is not coupon clipping? Many stores offers price match with online and local competitors. Price Match Genie is a revolutionary mobile assistant to save you a lot of money without wasting time.

How does Price Match Genie work? It's super easy. 
When you are in a store:
* Scan the product barcode with your phone, we will show you instantly its price from competitors with links to their pages. Currently we provide prices from Walmart and Amazon, and will expand to more stores.
* You can choose to save the item to a list.
* At checkout, show store associate competitor's price and get price match! 

Stores that offer price match (not a complete list):
Babies R Us
Bed Bath & Beyond
Best Buy
Fry's
Home Depot
J.C. Penney
Kohl's
Lowe's
OfficeMax
Sears
Staples
Target
Toys R Us
Walmart (with restrictions)

And many more. As always, it does not hurt to ask! Simply ask store associates on their price match policy and you will be pleasantly surprised!

recentChanges: Fixed bugs with Amazon barcode lookup.
comments: This app is a good start for what I think can be a super helpful tool. I'm going to use it at Best Buy for some back to school shopping. But here are two really valuable changes/additions that I hope you will consider. Second, show us more than just amazon and Wal Mart's price.

This is the best price match app I have ever download. Today, which is the very 1st day I downloaded this app and I saved over $9 on 3 items at Wal-Mart. This is a must have app.

title: Gold and Silver Prices
description:
This is silver and gold price tracker. The app is designed to keep You up to date with prices on precious metals. Also it provides custom calculation to get the price of your gold and silver items.

Gold tracker functionality. Get all live rates on one screen. Value of each metal may be seen depending on its purity. You can view the historical dynamics in form of interactive chart, zoom it to get daily values. View all gold price data in your national currency.

comments: I love this app!!! I no longer have to Google the spot prices of gold and silver. One button I push and all the current info is there!! They have a great calculator that tells me what my 14kt and 18kt is worth. All I have to do is enter the weight! Love it!!!!!
My only complaint is the dark background otherwise it does everything I need which is to keep me updated on gold, silver and other precious metals value.

Annoying ads no one ever watches. On a dark design having all the useless white ads popping op all the time this app is certainly not nice to work with. Several functions do not even work like spot price. Alternatives like Kitco work much nicer. They also have ads but not that annoying as this app.
Great, accurate, up to the minute, information, on metals, and currency. Love the ability to look at long term price trends.
Gold and Silver spot prices visible on the screen together and the option to change currency or unit of weight...just what I wanted.

title: Commodity Price Online
description:
The best ever built market tracking app for farmers and professional commodities traders!

Commodity Spy is a powerful tool for commodity price and position tracking. This application also informs you about any change, so you’re able to make the right decision at the right time!

Commodity Spy is not providing historical data since it’s focus is on current data tracking.

❖ Features a possibility to set different type of alerts and filters:

✔ If a tracked commodity is out of your range of interest. (Example: no more or less than 150-200)

✔ When a commodity’s price increases in a set amount of time (Example: per 1 day, 2 Euro)

✔ Track the price reduction. You won’t be informed as the price is rising, but right after the decline an alert appears.

✔ Track the commodities’ price fluctuation

This commodity price tracker is incredibly useful when selling or buying commodities. Stay up to date on any commodity changes in the market.

❖ At the moment we can offer these commodities:

# Brent Crude Oil Spot (NYSE)

# EUR/USD Spot (Forex)

# EUR/CAN Sot (Forex)

# Rapeseed (Euronext)

# Milling Wheat (Euronext)

# Corn (Euronext)

# Wheat (CBOT)

# Soybean (CBOT)

# Corn (CBOT)

# Soybean Meal (CBOT)

❖ In the nearest future, more commodities will be included, such as:

- Nitrogen Fertiliser Solution UAN 30 Futures

- Rapeseed Oil Futures

- Rapeseed Meal Futures

- Skimmed Milk Powder Futures

- Unsalted Lactic Butter Futures

- Live Cattle Futures

It's the perfect tool for farmers, agronomists and traders who are trading stocks, commodities or are looking into future exchange.

Get access to free real-time quotations on the future of energy, metals, grains and livestock commodities.



❖ List of Goods by categories in nearest future:

Energy: WTI Crude Oil, Brent, Heating Oil, RBOB Gasoline and Natural Gas futures.

Metals: Gold, Silver, Platinum, Palladium, Copper.

Grains: Corn, Oats, Rough Rice, Soybean Meal, Soybean Oil, Soybeans.

Livestock; Feeder Cattle, Lean Hogs, Live Cattle.

Exchanges: NYMEX, CBOT, CMEX, NYB, CME.

Ag commodities, agriculture, farming and farms.

title: Best Tech News, Reviews, Videos and Gadget Prices
description:
MySmartPrice app helps you decide what to buy and where to buy for mobiles, laptops, electronics, TVs, home appliances, audio products etc.

We have following features and content on the app for you.

News: 
We cover all the important news, new launches, live videos so that our readers and users can stay updated with all the happenings in the gadget world. Check out our News section.

Reviews and Expert Score:
Our mobile experts review each and every mobile and score it on the following parameters – Design and display, Camera, Performance, Battery life, and Value for money. Based on this we derive the Expert Score, which will help you select a phone when you are not sure.

Price Comparison: 
We get prices from all the top online retailers like Amazon, Flipkart, Tatacliq etc. and show it together along with offers and coupons so that you can find the best price for the product you are looking for. Prices are updated every few minutes and are highly accurate.

Best Lists: 
Our experts test and review mobiles and other gadgets and create Best Lists for various requirements. You can find the best and top–rated products for your requirements here.

Videos:
We shoot product videos in Hindi and English for our users. Check out our YouTube channel.

Upcoming Products:
We constantly try to find out the upcoming products. For many of these, we break the info on the Internet. Usually we are the first ones to cover these. Check out the leaks for upcoming devices covered by us.

title: Mobile Price Comparison App
description:
91mobiles is India’s best price comparison shopping app for mobile phones and gadgets. You can find the best mobile phones, laptops, tablets recommended by our gadget gurus, compare prices and product specs, and get the best deals from various online shopping sites like Flipkart, Amazon, Snapdeal, eBay, PayTM, Shopclues, etc.  

91mobiles helps you decide which gadget to buy, and where to buy it from. Here’s what all you can do with the 91mobiles app:


•   Smart Search – Find the most suitable gadgets for your needs

-   With 91mobiles’ phone finder, tablet finder, and laptop finder, you can input your requirements, and find the gadget most suitable for your needs, whether it is a budget Android phone, a high end Apple iPhone or a Samsung phone. Get a list of most recommended gadgets judged by the 91mobiles team of experts. 

-   The ‘91score’ is a score out of 100 given to each device, that helps you find the best device among the many options. 

•   Find mobile price lists of all brands

-   Find mobile phones and gadgets, along with their prices, from all major brands like Samsung, Micromax, Sony, Karbonn, HTC, Asus, Gionee, Lenovo, Huawei, Intex, Lava, Motorola, and LG as well as newer brands like Xiaomi, Infocus, Vivo, and OnePlus

•   Compare Mobiles, Laptops, Tablets & more:

-   Price Comparison - 91mobiles’ price comparison engine gives you the ability to compare prices for mobiles, tablets, laptops, televisions, cameras & power banks along with information on COD and EMI offers. Price listing is available for all major online shopping apps and stores such as Flipkart, Snapdeal, Paytm, eBay, Shopclues, Amazon. 

-   Feature & Spec Comparison - Make a smart choice with the help of 91mobiles’ compare tool. Get in-depth comparison of gadgets in terms of specs, features and reviews.

•   Get detailed Product Specs, Pictures & Videos

-   View detailed specs along with box contents, hi-res pictures, 360 degree shots and videos of popular mobiles. Get in-depth information on products from various categories such as mobiles, tablets, laptops, etc.

•   Product launch & Price Drop Alerts

-   Get instant alerts for new launches, latest news and hottest deals with on-the-go notifications. Select your favourite products and get immediate price drop alerts.

•   Latest mobile phone news & reviews – by experts and users

-   Learn more about the products you wish to buy with in-depth reviews and analysis written by 91mobiles experts, and users. Read about of the latest gadget news, weekly round ups of apps and exclusive deals of week. 

•   Most content-rich app

-   Other apps in the category like junglee, mysmartprice, and smartprix also help find products and compare prices. However 91mobiles app, in addition, also gives detailed information about each device, including an expert review, video review, device UI screenshots, and similar information.

If any feature is bothering you or you want to us to add something new, feel free to share feedback at care@91mobiles.com and we will incorporate it in our forthcoming release cycles.

title: Oil Price Live
description:
Check the current spot prices and historical oil prices, all in one app.

Features:
- Live crude oil prices ticker for WTI, Brent, Dubai, Urals (REBCO) Western Canadian Select (WCS), Oman and OPEC.
- Four home screen widgets displaying WTI oil price and Brent oil price, with customisation options.
- Charts in portrait and landscape mode with zoom, range from: last 24 hours, 7 days, month, year and 30+ years.
- Natural Gas Price
- News feed with energy related news.
- Commodities overview, including metals, grains, livestock, and softs.

Please note quotes are delayed.

Any feedbacks are much appreciated. If you have any questions or problems, please send me an e-mail.

title: OilPrice: Energy News & Prices
description:
Access the latest oil prices, energy news, market data and industry analysis from leading journalists around the world. 

Oilprice covers the latest stories in Energy, Oil Price Analysis, Alternative Energy, Finance, Geopolitics and more with more energy news than any other website.

Customize your own personal portfolio around latest news, price alerts and incoming market data. For reliable and up to the moment sector analysis you can rely on Oilprice to deliver the information you need, when you need it.

FEATURES:

- Energy News: Featured and trending stories in energy, oil news, alternative energy, finance, geopolitics and more.

- Oil Prices: More live oil prices than any other app with over 200+ blends, including WTI Crude & Brent Crude as well as OPEC blends, Canadian blends and US blends with price charts and comparison tools.

- Oil Blends: Track over 200+ oil blends from across the globe in your personal energy portfolio

- Market Data: Get the latest real-time oil and price data as well as market analysis at your fingertips.

- Alert Notifications: Receive daily news and price alerts from the energy topics and stocks that matter to you.

- Customizable Stock Alerts: Customize your personalized portfolio to notify you whenever stock has gone up or down - you set the prices, you set your targets.

- Customizable Watchlist: Easily track your portfolio by creating and editing your personal watchlist with tailored alerts.

- Share: With just one tap share your oil stock picks and energy news to your network.
- Comment: Discuss the news articles that matter to you most, connect with your favorite authors, and engage with the Oilprice community.

- Community: Engage with the largest community dedicated to Oil and Gas on the web.

ABOUT:

Oilprice.com is the most popular energy news and oil price website in the world. With market analysis that focuses on key areas of the energy industry including Oil and Gas, Alternative Energy and Geopolitics. 

Oilprice works with the largest names in financial news and provides news and industry analysis to sites such as: CNBC, Yahoo Finance, Nasdaq, Fortune, TIME Magazine, Huffington Post, USA Today, CNN Money, Business Insider as well as hundreds of others.

FEEDBACK:

The Oilprice app features are constantly being improved based on your feedback, please let us know what you love and what you’d like to see more of. All feedback is greatly received.

Contact us at: support@oilprice.com or on Twitter @OilandEnergy

recentChanges: Minor bug fixes.
comments: Being a part of a family business in the HVAC industry with fuel delivery as one of our main focuses, this app is an invaluable source for where crude is trending and for relevant articles on oil. Love the app. Using it every day and throughout the day. If you are involved in anything related to oil, you need this app.

Seems good. Would like the Indices layout to be a little more . . . Normal. Big tall squares with nothing but some small font in the middle. Thats weird. Using a Galaxy S8+. Seems like I have to do a couple extra taps to show Brent Crude. Its an oil price app not an oil news app. The price should be the default first thing to show up. But it isnt. Am I the only one that has left a rating? Double weird.

Decent app to get reasonably current oil prices. It runs well with no big issues. Lack of dashboard control means I have to do extra tapping to get access to the relevant data and can't bury the stuff I don't care about. Lack of widget support greatly reduces the usefulness of this app for me. I would also like to be able to launch articles to my preferred browser.

Gave it 4 stars initially, felt that was not fair, came back and gave it 5 because the app is really quite brilliant. The reason I gave it a '4' initially was because I'd prefer to see no advertising even if I had to pay for the privilege. I don't see an option to do so, but I guess the developer has a reason to structure it this way. And, I'll admit that the advertising is relatively discreet. So, there you go. 👍

Very helpful. Spot prices for major trading index plus ability to add specific markets of interest, i.e. East Texas Sweet, Natural Gas . Access to relevant articles in the app saves search time. Alerts customizable for prices or percentage change: excellent feature!

title: SoftScan - Barcode Scanner and Price Comparison
description:
Be a savvy shopper!

- Scan barcodes and QR codes
- Compare prices
- Create your own QR code

Why pay more than the best price out there? This is not your regular barcode scanner, it's also a price comparison app to help you save money.

Scan the barcode or QR code of any product (such as books, electronics, clothes, etc) and find which  retailer has the best price. Check the lowest price out there before you make a purchase!

We will do the work for you and get you the lowest prices on Amazon, eBay, Walmart, Rakuten (buy.com). Can't find it on any of these sites? Search Google or the web.

If none of the default websites are one of your favorite online stores where you do your regular shopping then enter your preferred website and it will promptly be available for you the search the product. For now we suggested alibaba.com and flipkart.com but these two can be changed to your favorite retailer website.

Did you find something you like but not ready to buy? Save the product information for later review. We automatically capture the scanned image and the name if available but you can also edit all this information.

Using the device camera, the Barcode/QR Code Scanner will quickly scan and decode the information on barcodes, QR Codes, Data Matrix and more. If the QR Code is a website URI, a phone number, an email, or a contact you will be able to perform the appropriate actions. For example, if you scan the code for a contact, you will be prompted to add the contact to your own contacts. 

Barcode Scanner/QR Code Scanner reads regular barcodes—UPC, EAN, and ISBN—and gathers information about the products you scan, allowing you to research and find places to shop for the products you love.

You can create QR Codes for text, an app, a contact, a phone number or from clipboard and then you can easily share, save or print.

Disclaimer:
- This application is based on the open source project ZXing barcode scanner. Apache License 2.0.
descriptionHTML:
Be a savvy shopper!

- Scan barcodes and QR codes
- Compare prices
- Create your own QR code

Why pay more than the best price out there? This is not your regular barcode scanner, it's also a price comparison app to help you save money.

Scan the barcode or QR code of any product (such as books, electronics, clothes, etc) and find which retailer has the best price. Check the lowest price out there before you make a purchase!

title: Online shopping: Price comparison app
description:
Online shopping and Price comparison.

The best way to do online shopping on mobile is here. Buyhatke gives you the ease of shopping across all major shopping portals with intelligence of price saving.  The app gives you price comparison, coupons, deals, price drop alerts all at once place with a simple and intuitive shopping experience. Not only that it gives you a lot more.  Read all of the amazing features below

The app gives you 

- Price comparison: An easy and a fast way to compare prices of over 30 million product while online shopping

- Single starting point for shopping anywhere: Helps you navigate to over 100 credible online shopping portals from where you can make the purchase at the lowest price. You get three amazing buttons at the bottom of these sites while browsing inside the app - compare prices, set alerts and price trends. 

- Price trend graph: Gives you a beautiful price graph on over 30 million products on major shopping portals like amazon, flipkart, jabong, myntra, snapdeal, that saves you while shopping online by telling you the right time to get the product at the best price

- Price drop alert: Helps you know when the price drops on your favorite products across sites like flipkart, jabong, myntra, amazon and snapdeal so that you always get the lowest price while shopping. 

- Price alert sync: Also beautifully syncs in price drop alerts set from the buyhatke browser extension (http://buyh.tk/3)  onto mobile and also alerts set from mobile get synced onto browser addon so that you never miss any price drop no matter where you are.

- Coupons and offers: Gets you the discounted price by showing discount coupons, promo coupons codes, hot deals of 65 major sites. So just choose the coupon or deal you like and complete the shopping entire shopping experience inside the Buyhatke app

- Deals: The most stunning deals are scouted for you from major online shopping sites and presented to you. The deals are given based on massive price falls on products and you can trust they are amazing deals by seeing the price trend

- Coupons at checkout: When you are at the checkout of a particular website it shows you a list of coupon codes in the specially designed “Show coupons” button. So you can get the best coupons without navigating from the checkout page and going through the frustrating process of search for get the coupons. Just tap on the coupon and the coupon code gets copied. Tap on the apply coupon box and paste it. 

Complete Shopping experience: You get to complete your entire shopping experience within the app. No need to navigate to a different browser and then complete it.  Simple, fast and secure shopping experience inside the app

No annoying notifications, battery and memory drain: With this app you can get rid of shopping apps and just keep this app as this app would suffice for all your shopping needs. 

Summary: So in short you can use this application to check price in India for any product across different shopping portals. You can then compare prices, set price drop alerts, check price variation to know the right time to buy and get discount coupons at checkout to save money. All in all covers all major features to help you make a great online shopping decision. 


And its available for free on playstore for all online shopping lovers. So what are you waiting for ?  Shop like never before with Buyhatke.

title: Unit Price Comparison
description:
This simple app allows you to compute and compare the price per unit of up to six items. It can be useful at any store - is it worth it to buy the bulk package? Which size saves you more?

The other unit price apps out there require too many steps to get your answer. This app is faster because it's dead simple: just type two numbers and you're done. To use the app, just enter the price of the item and the number of units (oz, lbs, number in package, etc). It will calculate the unit price as soon as the numbers are entered. There are fields for the quantity, name of each item and the name of each item's units, but they're optional.

You can use the Quantity to compare buying multiple packages - if you are buying 2 24 oz packages, you can either enter '48' in the Units field or '24 'in the Units field and '2' in the Quantity field.

There isn't currently a way to export the data, but if you want to save the comparison for later you can just take a screenshot.

This app has no ads, requires no permissions, and collects no data.

title: Auction Price Finder -price check & barcode reader
description:
What is the Auction Price Finder?

The Auction Price Finder is small free app, which checks the current value of any item on ebay, based on the last sales (now with barcode scanner). 

---------------------------------------------------------------

Benefits of the Price Finder

Like the famous quote "Price is what you pay; value is what you get." declares, it's important to know something's value to estimate a fair price. Every seller can ask for an individual price for any item. But if you don't know the value for that item, you also have no idea if you would pay too much for it! So it's crucial for you to know the average value, not the average asked price.
There's where the Auction Price Finder comes in handy. The price checker app calculates the average value for your item based on the last sales - not on the currently asked prices. In that way, you get a price which is closer to the real value of the item. This average price can now help you to decide if something is sold at a bargain price, or if the asked price is way too high.

---------------------------------------------------------------

How to check a price

The usage of the price finder is pretty simple. 
Just open the search form, enter the name of your item (or use the barcode scanner), select your country and tab GO. The auction price finder then checks the last sold items on ebay and calculates the average price for you. 

The price check is for both, sold auctions and sold Buy It Now - items. 

The calculated prices are shown on the result page. You may then scroll down, to take a closer look on the search result details. There you'll see a summary of the prices, which were used for the calculation of the average value. 
The "price range for Auctions" shows all used prices of the sold auction items, and the "price range for BuyItNow" shows all found prices of the sold Buy It Now – items (ordered from lowest to highest price).
The price ranges also display the calculated average prices. So you can quickly see, how many items have been sold for a price near the average price.
Below the price ranges you see a third graph. This is the summary of how much sold items where used for the calculation. Please notice that your search results are more accurate, the more items were included in the calculation of the average selling price.

If you swipe once to the right, you'll see the found categories for your search request. You can tap on one of them, to search further in the selected category. 
The next two pages showing the items which were used for the price calculation (Auctions and BuyItNow). You can tap on one item, to open it on ebay and take a closer look at the details. 

The last page shows all the excluded items. These are the ones, which were too cheap or too expensive. You can also tap on one of them, to open them on ebay.

---------------------------------------------------------------

Further functions of the price finder:

- select the maximum results per request (25, 50, 100 or 200)
- use a price range for your request
- exclude shippingfees

---- new functions added by updates ----

version 2.1:
- exclude words from search
- open active auctions
--> Now where you know the value of your item, you know how much you can spend on it.


version 1.7:
- barcode scanner 
--> Perfect to check the price for games, cds, books and so on.


version 1.4:
- optional search in active BuyItNow items

---------------------------------------------------------------

You can select between the following countries:

- Germany
- United States
- Canada
- UK
- Australia
- Austria
- Belgium
- France
- Italy
- Netherlands
- Spain
- Switzerland
- Ireland
- Malaysia
- Philippines
- Poland
- Singapore

---------------------------------------------------------------

Please notice that the application is a private project, which is in no way related to eBay Inc. in any manner.

title: Fluctuate - Universal Price Tracker
description:
Fluctuate is a price tracker that allows you to track the price of products from online shopping websites, and unlike most of the other price trackers on the Play Store, Fluctuate is a universal price tracker, which means that you can use it to track any product from any site. 

This includes many of the most popular sites like Amazon, eBay,  ASOS, Flipkart, Myntra and lots more. You could use Fluctuate as a flight price tracker that alerts you when some plane tickets become cheaper, or as an Amazon price tracker that notifies you when something you're interested in suddenly goes on sale. The possibilities are endless!

Want to get new features early?
Sign up for beta here to try out new features early:
https://play.google.com/apps/testing/com.buneme.fluctuate

Once you have done that, join the beta tester's community:
https://plus.google.com/communities/100988225996349024181

title: What's it worth on eBay? FREE
description:
What's it worth on eBay? That's what you want to know before selling your stuff on eBay or anywhere else. The eValuator app determines a realistic average price from items successfully sold in the past weeks. 
Perfect to find out what you can earn selling something, or to check if a promising bargain really is one. The ideal app for any powerseller, sales agent, ambitioned eBayer and for use on flea markets, yard sales and more ... 

Experience with eBay website (completed listings) is advised to fully take advantage of this app!


Features: 
=====================
* FREE version contains ads
* Supports ebay.at, ebay.ca, ebay.com, ebay.co.uk, ebay.com.au, ebay.ch, ebay.de, ebay.fr, ebay.ie, ebay.it, ebay.nl, ebay.es
* Shows estimated price, shipping, price range and net profit at a glance
* Statistics show price by day of week and price distribution graph
* Search by condition (new, used, ...) and in subcategories
* Browse the completed listings found for your search
* Adjustable filter: Ignore items containing certain words (eg, defective) 

Copyright:
===================
eBay (R) is a registered trademark of eBay Inc. This app is a private project and is in no way related to eBay Inc., 

Important:
===================
Since April 2010 search in completed items is possible without an eBay account on most country sites.
This might change again in the future, in which case the app will inform you. Until then the login only gives you advantages calculating the shipping to your personal location.
Of course your account data remains on your device exclusively and is never sent to me, or to other third parties! It is only used to securely login to the eBay website via HTTPS/SSL. 
Just use the app without login, if you still have concerns!

This app is under active development! Suggestions and bug reports are welcome! Reviews of course too ;-)
Please note that due to technical reasons this app may be updated quite often! Do not install if this is a problem for you.
descriptionHTML:
What's it worth on eBay? That's what you want to know before selling your stuff on eBay or anywhere else. The eValuator app determines a realistic average price from items successfully sold in the past weeks.
Perfect to find out what you can earn selling something, or to check if a promising bargain really is one. The ideal app for any powerseller, sales agent, ambitioned eBayer and for use on flea markets, yard sales and more ...

Experience with eBay website (completed listings) is advised to fully take advantage of this app!


Features:
=====================
* FREE version contains ads
* Supports ebay.at, ebay.ca, ebay.com, ebay.co.uk, ebay.com.au, ebay.ch, ebay.de, ebay.fr, ebay.ie, ebay.it, ebay.nl, ebay.es
* Shows estimated price, shipping, price range and net profit at a glance
* Statistics show price by day of week and price distribution graph
* Search by condition (new, used, ...) and in subcategories
* Browse the completed listings found for your search
* Adjustable filter: Ignore items containing certain words (eg, defective)

Copyright:
===================
eBay (R) is a registered trademark of eBay Inc. This app is a private project and is in no way related to eBay Inc.,

Important:
===================
Since April 2010 search in completed items is possible without an eBay account on most country sites.
This might change again in the future, in which case the app will inform you. Until then the login only gives you advantages calculating the shipping to your personal location.
Of course your account data remains on your device exclusively and is never sent to me, or to other third parties! It is only used to securely login to the eBay website via HTTPS/SSL.
Just use the app without login, if you still have concerns!

This app is under active development! Suggestions and bug reports are welcome! Reviews of course too ;-)
Please note that due to technical reasons this app may be updated quite often! Do not install if this is a problem for you.
summary: What's your item worth on eBay? Find out!
recentChanges:
6.1.0 - 6.1.2
- Android 9 compatibility and bugfixes
- Updated frameworks and safety standards
- Requires Android 4.x
- Filter setting "exact match only" and "sort order" can be persisted

6.0.2
- Comply with new EU regulations
- Full re-programming of the network communication layer
- Login now uses the eBay website, no more credentials inside the app
- Suggestions while typing
- Many more improvements in user experience
comments: I've used a few scanners to determine what to price an item for on eBay. This app is really nice as it works very quickly and takes shipping costs into account. It also looks at sold items, so you know what an item is going for, what it costs to ship, and if it has sold recently. There are a few more items that would be great to have in a scanner like this - I would pay for those features. When selling an item on eBay, eBay collects between 10 and 12% depending on item. PayPal takes 30 cents per transaction. PayPal also takes 2.9% per transaction. It would be great if you could go into settings and configure those options so you'd have a much closer idea of what your potential profit could be. Right now, I'd need to use the app to see what an item goes for, then subtract 15% or so for eBay and PayPal costs, then subtract item cost to get an idea of what profit would be. It would be slick if the app just took that 15% and 30 cents out up front.

Takes a bit of trial and error to figure out the specifics of finding the info you want but it will quickly give you a approximate guide to a price of what your searching. In the end though it still comes down to its worth what someone will pay. If the app gave info on where you would sell an item for the price given then that would be great, if the app acted as a go between for seller and buyer (for a small fee of course) that would make it outstanding.

Im not a fan of the app yes it functions and you can type in a description but the problem is you dont know if it is correct because there is no picture to identify that it is the right item. Multiple catergories come up as well again making it hard to determine what category it would belong to as sellers may list the same item in one category and another seller might list it in a different one. Im just unable to use it.

This app is without a doubt the best app I've ever downloaded...simple to use..very fast and accurate...before u post for sale on Ebay or any other sales apps ...do yourself a huge favor and price ur item on here...let's you know how much , when, how many others ,best time of the monthe to sell for max money...going yard saleing... dont leave home without it...best easiest EVER

It has alot of very useful info. I'm still figuring it out but I can see I will be relying on its accuracy. Thanks great app! I just wanted to mention I wish it was a tiny bit more illiterate user friendly. For such as myself 🤔

title: Gold Live! Gold Price, Silver, Base Metals, News
description:
Kitco’s new and improved, award-winning* Gold Live!, gives you access to the latest market price quotes, charts, precious metals news and expert opinions in familiar but improved and exciting user experience. All the news and information you love in a better, faster and more intuitive package of our existing app used millions of users with an average of a 4.5-star user rating. Updated and improved news, commentaries and press release sections and a new widget, breaking news and market alert features. 

*NEW* The widget now allows you to add multiple widgets, each with its own commodity.

The all-new Gold Live! Keeps its familiar feel that’s loved by millions while vastly improving and speeding up the access to precious metals quotes and charts. In addition to following markets, you can watch Kitco News video interviews on our improved mobile-friendly video platform.  With comprehensive coverage and full control, it brings live spot prices for gold, silver, and other metals, along with critical market information to your fingertips. Live quotes, charts, video news, commentaries and much more! 

Download the official Gold Live! App and get all the latest updates so you’re always on top of the latest precious metals, finance, stocks and mining news.
 
YOUR FAVORITE PRECIOUS METALS AT A GLANCE - Uncover trading information and the latest news from Kitco News, Kitco Commentaries and other leading sources.

BREAKING NEWS AND ALERTS. Never miss a story - Get real-time notifications sent directly to your phone for the biggest breaking business news.

KEEP UP WITH THE MARKETS - Find market data on all the precious metals, base metals, mining equities, cryptocurrencies, FX and more -- always one tap away.

KITCO NEWS – Watch the best industry videos and stories from Kitco News, delivered right to your phone. And this is just the start. Our editorial and development teams are working hard to roll out new features regularly.

KITCO GOLD INDEX (KGX) - Shows how US dollar fluctuations impact the value of gold. The Kitco Gold Index has one purpose that is to determine whether the value of gold is actual, a reflection of changes in the US Dollar value, or a combination of both.

Key Features (Overview) 
- Widget
- Precious and base metals quotes in multiple currencies
- Mining news and stocks 
- Currencies exchange rates (FX)
- Cryptocurrency prices and news
- Kitco Gold Index (KGX)
- Charts and data
- Video news
- Customizable market alerts
- Breaking news from the finance world
- Gold price
- Silver price
- Spot gold
- Spot silver
- Gold news
- Silver news 

Live spot and historical precious metals prices and charts
- Gold, silver, platinum, palladium, rhodium 
- Daily and historical London Fix
- Charts and data
- Kitco Gold Index (KGX)

The latest market news at your fingertips 
- Commentaries
- Analysis
- Press releases
- Stocks
- FOREX
- Futures
- Investment trends

Video news
- Interviews 
- Exclusive reports
- Event coverage 

Mining 
- Mining news
- Mining stocks
- Video news
- Event coverage 

Indices
- DJIA, NASDAQ, S&P 500, USD Index, NYSE, TSX, NIKKEI, XAU, HUI, JSE Gold, TSX Gold, and GFMS 

Currency rates (FOREX)
- Canadian dollar (CAD), Euro (EUR), British pound (GBP), Australian dollar (AUD), Japanese Yen (JPY), Chinese yuan (CNY), Brazilian real (BRL), Swiss franc (CHF), Mexican peso (MXN), Russian ruble (RUB), Hong Kong dollar (HKD), South African rand (ZAR), and Indian rupee (INR)

Live and historical base metals quotes
- Copper, nickel, aluminum, zinc, lead, and uranium

Cryptocurrencies live prices and charts
- Bitcoin (BTC), Ethereum (ETH), Litecoin (LTC), Monero (XMR), Ripple (XRP), Dash (DASH), Zcash (ZEC) 

Other features
- Oil price

Would you like to request a new feature? Have any questions, technical issues or feedback? Contact us at mobilesupport@kitco.com

* Gold Live! won the gold medal for the best mobile app design at the 2019 Canadian Online Publishing Awards (COPA) in the business division.

comments: App works well for me, and I like the lay-out, so 5 stars for that. But the quotes are delayed by like a 1/2 hour. This limits its effectiveness greatly. Its fine for the casual market watcher with no skin in the game, but for investors who need live quotes, it's not much good. Get it together, Kitco. Make it live. 1 star for actual accuracy. Average 3 stars in total.

It is a very good app. I really like it. Sometimes it's a little bit slow to open a page. A suggestion... to add the subtitle option for news in video for some people with hearing impairment. Thank you
Nice app. The widget size is too big, though. 2x3 is too large for more than 2 widgets on my home screen. Will continue to use it, but please consider changing that.
Has stopped working, says communication error. I guess I'll delete and use one of the other 1000's of apps available to get my gold/silver prices Update 2 /28 Still doesn't work on my pixel 2 xl
As an Android app developer, I can honestly say that this is a top-notch app. Great job Kitco!

title: Mobile Price and Specs
description:
Mobile Price and Specs is an application where you will find the specifications of all the top selected smart phones of top brands like Apple, Samsung, Sony, Motorola, Xiaomi, Huawei and many more. Compare and analyse the technical features and then figure out which phone to buy.

Features
1. Free notifications of latest device
2. Mobile launching price
3. Browse mobile by categories
4. Advance filter option for selecting your device with your budget and requirement
5. Detailed specifications of mobile phones and tablets
5. You can view launching prices in Indian Rupees/Pakistani Rupees/Bangladeshi Taka/Euro and US dollar.

Note: We show price from popular local retailer shops. However the price may vary from dealers to dealers and price may decrease over time. The price we show in our specifications page is for reference information only which is useful for comparison purposes. This price is often the initial launch price of the phone. We do not guarantee that you can find the device with exact same price in a shop or mall in your current area of residence.

title: Video Game Price Charts
description:
*** IF SOMETHING BREAKS, PLEASE E-MAIL ME INSTEAD OF WRITING A REVIEW! THANKS! ***

Quickly look up current market prices for over 26,600 video games from your Android device! Avoid getting ripped off at pricy secondhand gaming stores, or confirm that you've dug up a diamond in the rough at a garage sale. You can even scan a barcode for a speedy lookup, no typing necessary. Pricing data is provided by http://videogames.pricecharting.com/, please visit the website for even more price information.

Please note that I do not work for Video Game Price Charts, and they do not tell me when they make changes to their site layout. If their site layout changes and the app starts crashing, please send me an e-mail and let me know!

title: Gas Guru: Cheap gas prices
description:
Don’t empty your wallet at the pump… Gas Guru helps you save time, effort, and money before you hit the road! Quickly find the best gas prices nearby.
 
Do you always find yourself filling up near home or down the street from work? Label and save your frequent locations for easy access to up to date prices. You can even save a few extra cents by comparing the price of gas near work, home, or other favorite locations to find the cheapest available. Tap to get directions, view the time of the last price update, and more.
 
Download the app today, rev up those engines, and hit the road!
 
Features:
·         Find cheap gas prices near you**
·         Full list of amenities, fuel types and services available for each gas station.
·         Filter your searches based on amenities like cash discount, ATM, 24Hr etc.
·         Compare gas prices near work, home, or other favorite locations
·         Label and save your frequent locations for easy access to cheap gas nearby
·         Filter your search by gas/fuel grade and view results by map or list view
·         Get the detailed info you need –  directions, maps, prices of all grades, address, time of last gas price update, and more
 
A handy road companion, Gas Guru makes it easy to save money and get more of what you need on the go.  Download Gas Guru now!
 
Be safe, don’t be a distracted driver…
 
 
** Service Station and Fuel Price Data provided by OPIS (Oil Price Information Service) in cooperation with Wright Express

comments: Getting better! Now users can report gasoline prices. This app shows more results on the page without all those big intrusive data sucking ads and promos like Gas Buddy has. Switched to Gas Guru now and never looked back. 👍
Not showing all gas stations

I don't know why somany people are saying that there aren't certain options to this app there's definitely a list of gas stations for my area I can decide whether they are listed by best price or closest distance. Also there is a refresh button it says reset at the top you have to actually take a look at the app not just write a review. Since downloading this app I have saved over $25 definitely give the app five stars.

i DO NOT like the upgrades!!! i liked it better when i could update the area i want to see the prices in this new updates an area and then will take u to the "best" price in the area and often it is 10 -20 miles out of rout to get to it
Love this app. Stays up to-date and is almost always right. Would give 5 but it is missing a few gas stations that keep really competitive prices.

title: Price Reminder (Price Book)
description:
How many times have you walked into a shop and couldn't recall the price from a previous visit? Or, how much did last years car insurance cost?

Well, Price Reminder is a price book app that lets you store prices of shopping products and your home bills. The app will let you analyse your prices to see how the price has increased or decreased. 

Features:
• View your data online (https://www.price-reminder.com/dashboard/)
• Track products and prices
• Track bills
• Analyse pricing strategy
• Shopping list basket
• Scan barcode
• Retrieve price data from other users
• Search and filter products and shopping items
• Backup and restore data
• Scroll to category
• Change currency / region

comments: Switching phones and my old price book app isn't on Google Play anymore. There really aren't any good ones for Google. This one looked promising but I was quickly disappointed. I don't mind buying an unlock key, but subscribing to edit the date is ridiculous. You can't add multiple brands for the same product, which is essential for comparing prices. You have to start typing in a store name before the list shows up. It should just be a drop down menu. I didn't use it much, so I'm probably missing things. But a subscription cost for such a basic app is a complete deal breaker. Obviously the market for this is people who are trying to save money...
best for me i used it for 2 years. have options for barcodes
Super slow scan. Doesn't recognize products

Won't allow choosing picture already on camera, only allows pictures taken. 
For us security-minded, etc., won't back up to phone, only online syncing, 
no offline. Limited fields with no custom ones possible. Very promising but 
these 3 limitations just are too big to ignore. Hopefully future edits will 
address these issues.
Decent for basic grocery management. The need to buy a subscription to manage specials is irritating.

Scan EVERY type of Barcodes
From Barcode to QR codes you can easily scan any product. Compare prices and find the best deal, saving you time and money!

title: Commodity Prices
description:
This app is informative resource available to those interested in commodity prices. Get instant access to free real-time quotes for the top energy, metals, grains and livestock commodities futures.

All stock market quotes are separated by corresponding categories. Each category contains a list of goods presented in the form of cards. Every item has it's own menu with options. - "Details" option. Find information about commodity prices and trading, such as ask, bid, high, low, volume etc. all in real time. In addition there is fully interactive historical stock charts showing data up to 6 months.
- "Chain". Shows the list of futures for the selected product. Every list item can be opened for detailed overview.

List of Goods.
Energy: WTI Crude Oil, Brent, Heating Oil, RBOB Gasoline and Natural Gas futures.
Metals: Gold, Silver, Platinum, Palladium, Copper.
Grains: Corn, Oats, Rough Rice, Soybean Meal, Soybean Oil, Soybeans.
Livestock; Feeder Cattle, Lean Hogs, Live Cattle.
Softs: Cocoa, Coffee, Cotton, Lumber, Orange Juice, Sugar.

Exchanges.
NYMEX, CBOT, CMEX, NYB, CME.

Additional features:
- Nice and easy to use UI.
- Full tablets support.
- Swipe to refresh.

title: Price Comparison App - Scrooge
description:
Get the best prices and compare thousands of products, all through a single Price Comparison UK App. Monitor price drops for your favourite products!

Scrooge app lets you easily compare products prices across hundreds of UK online shops, such as John Lewis, Amazon, Currys, ASOS, M&S, HMV, Superdry and many more stores. 

  Main features of Scrooge Price Comparison App

► Price Comparison: Discovers thousands of products & compare store prices in the UK, so you can always find the best deals

► Price Alerts: Set price alerts for any product you want & receive a notification when it reaches your target price. You won't miss any price drop!

► Product Specifications & Details: View & Compare product specs, see products images, reviews etc.

► Price History: Check price history of any product & buy it at the right time

► Smart Product Search: Use our fast product search engine with autocomplete & voice search features

► Product Filtering & Sorting: Apply smart filters & sorting options to narrow your results with ease

► Favorite Products: Make lists of your “Favourites” & get in-app alerts when their price or availability changes. Also, if you are already a member of Scrooge.co.uk, you can Synchronise your “Favourites” to your account!

--------------------------------------------------------------------------


Scrooge mobile app brings the next-generation price comparison shopping experience on-the-go for the UK & Ireland. 

Search, Compare Store Prices & Get the best deals!
