title: Price Comparison, Price Tracker and Amazon Deals
description:
MyCartSavings helps with price comparison, barcode scanner, gives daily deals, amazon price tracker, walmart price tracker, eBay price tracker, price history, amazon promo codes & amazon coupons and save on your shopping. It's FREE app that compare online real time prices of Amazon, Walmart , eBay & Best Buy and helps to "Shop" those items from retailer. It also do price comparison using your voice, barcode scanner & gives daily deals from Amazon, Walmart, eBay, Best Buy, Macy's, Target, GameStop, Loft, Fossil, eVitamins, AliExpress, JCPenney and Men's warehouse. And also track prices and gives email notification & notifications on your phone when prices goes below expected price. 

If you like this app and find it useful, please give reviews in google play store. For any suggestions, issues and concerns, pls reach us at mycartsavings@gmail.com.

Compare millions of products available on Amazon, Walmart, eBay & Best Buy. Compare Prices, get best deals & lowest price on books, laptops, toys, furniture, clothes, tablets, cameras, home, electronics, video games, tvs, computers, tools from Amazon, Walmart , eBay, Best Buy at a time and save time & money on your shopping. It also compare textbook prices, gives daily deals and with online shopping, price scanner, barcode scanner and gives amazon promo codes, amazon coupons.

Price tracker:

This app helps to do Amazon price tracker, Walmart price tracker, eBay price tracker and gives email notification and notifications on your phone when price goes below your expected price. While doing comparison, click on "Price Tracker" and set your expected price. We will track prices and gives email and push notifications. 

How this app works:

1) Enter the particular item name you want to shop e.g. iPad Pro. It will give the search results along with prices from Amazon, Walmart, eBay where you can do price comparison at level1.
2) Click on microphone to search using your voice & barcode which are present along with the search box which will helps to search using your voice, scan and get item prices using Barcode scanning while you are in shop or home. 
3) Click on one of search results link  to do price comparison of selected item from Amazon, Walmart, eBay and Best Buy  where you can do price comparison at level2. 
4) Click on "Shop Now" button when you want to buy the item which will redirect to respective retailer. 
5) When you click on search results from level 1 price comparison, you will also get the "Customers also Bought" from Amazon and Walmart and "Customers also Considered" from Walmart along with Level2 price  comparison. When you click on "Customers also Bought" & "Customers also Considered" or Product Recommendations, you will get the Level2 price comparison. 

Here are the key features of this app:

1) Compare real time online prices of major online retailers using the key word. 
2) Scan the barcode while at shop or home and compare real time online prices using barcode scanning/ price scanning and quickly shop the item. 
3) Search using your voice and compare real time prices using your own voice.
4) Compare prices at 2 levels. At level1, get the search results and price comparison from Amazon, Walmart , eBay based on keyword search. 
5) When click on one of the search results, based on the selected items, do price comparison at level2. 
6) Gives daily deals from many retailers and gives amazon promo codes & amazon coupons. 
7) Price tracker : We track Amazon, Walmart & eBay prices and gives price alert when price goes below your expected price. While doing price comparison, click on "Price Tracker" and set price tracking.
8) Displaying the items customer wants to consider or similar items along with selected item. When user clicks on "Customer also Considered", it will also do price comparison. 
9) Get the product reviews  and shipping information on eBay.

title: Instant Price Comparison For Amazon Shopping
description:
It’s the ultimate price comparison tool for Amazon sellers and buyers! With our powerful barcode 
scanner you can directly scan barcodes or browse on Amazon, then instantly compare prices across 
all Amazon’s websites to get the best price. Find the best deals on items as a seller, or see the 
markets where you can make the biggest profits as a seller!
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- 
★ PRICE COMPARISON FOR AMAZON SHOPPING – HIGHLIGHTS ★
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- 
• Powerful barcode scanner finds the same product on Amazon in seconds
• Instant price comparison across Amazon UK, Amazon USA and every other country
• Find the best price, deals & discounts as a buyer
• Find the most lucrative markets and biggest profit potential as an Amazon seller
• Check genuine ratings and reviews for any product you scan or search for 
• Scan barcodes or search directly through the app

▸ INSTANT BARCODE SCANNER
Found an item you love in store? Think you can get it cheaper? With our powerful barcode scanner, 
simply scan the barcode of the item you like and we’ll instantly show you the same item on Amazon 
shopping. Not just Amazon UK or USA, but every Amazon website!

▸ COMPARE RATINGS & REVIEWS
Sometimes we can’t get the information we need when shopping in a store. When you scan a 
barcode or browse directly from the app, you’ll be able to access thousands of reviews and ratings 
from genuine people who have owned and tested the product. Put your doubts to rest and avoid 
buying poor quality items – it only takes a few seconds!

▸ FIND THE BEST DEALS & DISCOUNTS
When you use our app, we’ll compare the price of the item across every Amazon website, finding 
you the best price. Find great deals and discounts on the items you love – it may even be cheaper 
purchasing from another country! 

▸ PERFECT FOR AMAZON SELLERS
As an Amazon seller, it’s important to maximize your profits. Maybe your home country isn’t the 
best market to sell your new product in. When you use our price comparison tool, you’ll be able to 
see which countries sell the item at the highest price, giving you an opportunity to make even more 
profit from your Amazon business by selling in other markets. =============================================================================
FIND THE BEST DEALS & DISCOUNTS. MAXIMIZE PROFITS. DOWNLOAD OUR APP FOR FREE!
=============================================================================

---
This app was not created or endorsed by Amazon.

title: Price Comparison Shopping App - Pricekart
description:
Pricekart is India’s best price comparison app which is now available on Play Store. It is the best shopping app for Smart shoppers before they make buying decisions online. Online shoppers can Find, Research, and Compare Prices from millions of products. Get the lowest prices, deals and coupons from more than 100 stores in India.

Download the free price comparison app & Never pay more, never make a wrong decision & buy the best at the least.

Here’s what you can get at Pricekart in a glance

Pricekart is powered by artificial intelligence & machine learning that help users make the right shopping decision.

Discover
Search via text or speech from about 2 million products from top 100 online stores in India. Wide variety of filter & sorting functions to enable users to search by category, store, by seller or by keyword to zero in to find the right product.

Research

Lowest Price: Get the real-time lowest price for millions of products across various stores in India. Set price alerts to get notified of a price drop on your favorite product & save money while shopping.

Reviews: Detailed product information including latest expert reviews, Store reviews, Seller Reviews, Price history, images and ratings on various products to make the right decision while buying online.

Compare: Our comparison feature lets the users compare up to four products at a time. Choose products to compare their features, specifications, impartial reviews and price to help you make a smart buying decision.

All of this accompanied with real time Deals, Coupons, Offers, Cashbacks and much more.

True to our tagline "Buying Decisions Simplified", Pricekart is here to make it easy for the users to become smart buyers. Find everything under one platform along with accurate real-time prices of the products that suit your needs while 'choosing the best, but paying the least'.

title: Gold Live! Widget - Gold Price, Silver Price
description:
Version 2.2: The widget is now compatible with all Android devices.

The Gold Live! Widget for Android™ brings real-time precious and base metal prices to your fingertips. See the most important information at a glance, on your home page. The Gold Live! Widget for Android™ is now available to download for free!

Key features of the Gold Live! Widget for Android™
• Instant, at-a-glance information on the home page
• Live precious metal prices in 14 currencies and 3 units of measure (ounce, gram and kilo)

title: GoodRx Drug Prices and Coupons
description:
Save up to 80% on your prescription drug costs!

**GoodRx can save you hundreds of dollars a month, even if you have insurance or Medicare.**

Most Americans don't know that prescription prices vary wildly from pharmacy to pharmacy. There's never been a way to compare drug prices - until now. 

GoodRx makes comparing prescription drug prices easy. Our app provides current cash and sale prices, coupons and valuable savings tips for thousands of prescriptions at pharmacies near you. GoodRx tells you which pharmacies have drugs for less than $4 per fill, and some where certain prescriptions for free! 

Best of all, GoodRx coupons can be used from within the app - simply hand your phone to the pharmacist to save up to 80%! No need to print out anything - find savings on the go!

GoodRx is 100% free to use - there are no fees or obligations to you. You can use GoodRx for every member of your family, including pets.

GoodRx has been featured by Consumer Reports, The New York Times, PBS, ABC News, Forbes, CNN, The LA Times and more. Our app is used by hundreds of doctors and clinics to help save patients money on their medications.

GoodRx loves our reviews and may sometimes use them, in whole or edited form, in our marketing materials. Read our Terms of Use for more info.

By downloading GoodRx, you agree to be bound by our Terms Of Use. Read more at http://www.goodrx.com/terms-of-use 

Start saving on your prescriptions with GoodRx!

*GoodRx works to makes its apps accessible to all, including those with disabilities. If you are having difficulty accessing this application, please call or email us at (855) 268-2822 or ada@goodrx.com so that we can provide you with the services you require through alternative means.*

recentChanges:
When we started GoodRx, we wanted our brand to be different with our yellow and black design.

But then, we created GoodRx Gold, our subscription service that unlocks even lower prices at pharmacies near you. GoodRx Gold has been shoved right inside the regular GoodRx app. You can now sign up and show your digital Gold card to a pharmacist. People may say “That’s not gold - it’s yellow!” They ain’t wrong.

Send tips, bugs, ironic things, or suggested color palettes to android@goodrx.com.
comments: What a wonderful app!! So happy with the prices. More than half the price of my insurance. I'm on Medicare and could not afford my prescriptions. I either had to do without or cut dose in half. It is so nice to have an alternative to the insurance and prescription drug companies that gouge prices just to line their pockets! Hopefully your app will cause some heartache to those theives who have been putting it to the little guy for decades. I recommend this app to everyone I know. Thank you again

Very helpful for saving money. Make sure you check with individual pharmacies before transferring your prescription. For instance, Fred Meyer will only let you fill ONE prescription. And once you've chosen that particular prescription, you cannot add another prescription to their "profile" at Fred Meyer. Even if you don't ever need refills again. Personally, I don't think they are living up to their arrangement with Good Rx, and should not be allowed to participate. But the app is TERRIFIC!

This app saved me more than half off of my first prescription. I would recommend this app to anyone that wants to save money on prescriptions. It is easy to use. I simply show the coupon from my phone to the pharmacist and that is it. Simple. I was a little worried that pharmacies would frown upon receiving a coupon and the added work to process. However, it appears to be seemless for them to enter as well and quick.

Great Application. Allows you to find stores near you with prices similar to having insurance. I couldn't believe the great prices and this is just with the GOOD RX App. You save even more for a current price of $5.99 a month with over a Thousand participating Pharmacies like Costco, CVS and more. Unfortunately Walgreens, Walmart and Sam's aren't on the Gold List but are on Standard Good RX card. Right now I just use the free version but soon will probably opt in on the RX Gold.

This is probably the easiest app I have ever used!!! They have saved my husband and i so much money. I stopped my prescription coverage thru medicare because they doubled. I take 3 pills a month and didnt need it. Then my husband had a hear attack. Goodrx saved us about $125 on all four of his subscriptions. 😊

title: Gold Silver Price Now
description:
Gold Silver Price Now is a free Android app for gold and silver investors.

This Android app gives you LIVE gold price and silver price by the second with large beautiful charts and auto-updates. The app has been designed from the ground up to be minimalistic and ultra-fast; so you, the sophisticated gold and silver investors can quickly glance at the most updated gold and silver price.

The app comes packed with gold silver historical price and charts by day, month, and year.

Gold Silver Price Now is truly a must-have app for the serious investor.


Features:
- Live Gold Price and Live Silver Price in US Dollars per ounce.
- Display bid, ask, 24 hour high, 24 hour low, and price change.
- Price updates every 15 seconds.
- Gold Price Chart and Silver Price Chart of history of 1 day, 30 days, 60 days, 1 year, 5 years, and 10 years.
- Beautiful material design (the one and only Gold/Silver Price app in the app store)
- Simple Lightweight Gold Silver Price Widget on your Homescreen for Phone and Tablets
- More to come!

description:
Pricekart is India’s best price comparison app which is now available on Play Store. It is the best shopping app for Smart shoppers before they make buying decisions online. Online shoppers can Find, Research, and Compare Prices from millions of products. Get the lowest prices, deals and coupons from more than 100 stores in India.

Download the free price comparison app & Never pay more, never make a wrong decision & buy the best at the least.

Here’s what you can get at Pricekart in a glance

Pricekart is powered by artificial intelligence & machine learning that help users make the right shopping decision.

Discover
Search via text or speech from about 2 million products from top 100 online stores in India. Wide variety of filter & sorting functions to enable users to search by category, store, by seller or by keyword to zero in to find the right product.

Research

Lowest Price: Get the real-time lowest price for millions of products across various stores in India. Set price alerts to get notified of a price drop on your favorite product & save money while shopping.

Reviews: Detailed product information including latest expert reviews, Store reviews, Seller Reviews, Price history, images and ratings on various products to make the right decision while buying online.

Compare: Our comparison feature lets the users compare up to four products at a time. Choose products to compare their features, specifications, impartial reviews and price to help you make a smart buying decision.

All of this accompanied with real time Deals, Coupons, Offers, Cashbacks and much more.

Decisions
True to our tagline "Buying Decisions Simplified", Pricekart is here to make it easy for the users to become smart buyers. Find everything under one platform along with accurate real-time prices of the products that suit your needs while 'choosing the best, but paying the least'.

title: Buyhatke Online Shopping Assistant
description:
BuyHatke is India’s best price comparison platform. Our platform gives you access to shop across all the major online shopping sites at one place, thereby saving you both your money and time. And the all-new Buyhatke app allows you to compare prices, helps you search for the best coupons and offers of the day, shows you price fluctuations of your favourite product, and keeps you informed about its performance in the market. Not just that. It also gives you the option to set price alerts to your favourite product and notifies you whenever its price drops down to your expectations. Buyhatke - one app for all your shopping needs. 

Here are some of the features that are loaded on the app.

A fast and an easy way to compare prices of more than 30 million products online across different sites

Price trend graph: This feature gives you price graph of more than 30 million products on all the popular shopping apps, such as Amazon online shopping app, Flipkart online shopping app, Myntra online shopping app, Snapdeal online shopping app, etc., and not just this, it also guides you on the right time to buy the product for the best price.

Price drop alert: This is one of the best features of Buyhatke app. It allows you to set price drop alert to your preferred product and notifies you whenever its price drops to your expectations across all the major shopping apps, such as Flipkart shopping app, Myntra online shopping app, Amazon online shopping app, Snapdeal online shopping app, Jabong online shopping app. This helps you tremendously to buy the product at the lowest price. 

Price alert sync: This feature syncs the price drop alert feature from Buyhatke browser extension (http://buyh.tk/3) onto your mobile phone and vice versa. So whether you are active on your browser or on your mobile phone, you will never miss an update on a particular product’s price and offer. 

Coupons and offers: This feature shows you all the discount coupons, promo coupons codes, deal of the day, offer of the day, and others. The only thing you are required to do is choose a coupon or the offer you like and finish your shopping. 

Deals: The most astounding deals are searched specially for you from all the popular shopping apps, like Flipkart online shopping app, Amazon online shopping app, Myntra online shopping app, Snapdeal online shopping app, etc., and provided to you. The deals are given based on price drops on products. You can also check the price trend to confirm. 

Coupons at checkout: This feature provides you with the latest discount coupons, vouchers, and the best deals at the checkout at the following portals: Myntra, Jabong, Snapdeal, MakeMyTrip, Amazon, Yatra, Flipkart, Ebay, Cleartrip, Dominos, and Foodpanda.

No annoying notifications, no battery drain: If you have the Buyhatke online shopping app, you don’t need to worry about annoying notifications and battery drain. You need to preserve the battery on your phone for important things and we understand this perfectly. The all-new Buyhatke app is light and won’t send you any unnecessary notifications. 

Product Finder: This feature helps you find specific products you are looking for in seconds. This not only saves your precious time, but also makes your shopping experience pleasant beyond means. The only thing you are expected to do is choose your category (mobile phone, laptop, etc.), set your budget and your priorities. That’s all. The Product Finder feature will filter them out and gives you the products that suit your requirements. 

Price Trend: The new ‘Share Feature’ enables you to ‘Get Price Trend’. This innovative feature provides you with the price graph and allows you to check the lowest price of the product you are searching for. All you are required to do is open the app, share the product, and then click on ‘Get Price Trend’. You will get all the information you need on the product.

title: Universal price tracking tool
description:
Have you noticed that price of same product changes several times a day? 
If you are tired of constant shopping site checking for price of the product you desire, I introduce you to KAEYO (from keep an eye on) - universal price tracking tool.

KAEYO - universal price tracker. It works on all most popular shopping sites like Ebay, Amazon and many others.
Simply add the product you desire and application will notify you about the price changes and the only thing you need to do is - decide when to buy.

Free version provides possibility to track up to 3 products, but no other feature is limited. We trust that you must try full functionality before deciding to buy full version for a small fee. Full version allows you to track unlimited product amount.

Features:
Supports almost all shopping sites, like Amazon, Ebay, Flipkart etc.
Price change notifications.
Tracking list and archive.
Backup and restore data on new device.
View price change history in a very informative Chart.

It’s the ultimate price comparison tool for Amazon sellers and buyers! With our powerful barcode 
scanner you can directly scan barcodes or browse on Amazon, then instantly compare prices across 
all Amazon’s websites to get the best price. Find the best deals on items as a seller, or see the 
markets where you can make the biggest profits as a seller!
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- 
★ PRICE COMPARISON FOR AMAZON SHOPPING – HIGHLIGHTS ★

• Powerful barcode scanner finds the same product on Amazon in seconds

• Find the best price, deals & discounts as a buyer

▸ INSTANT BARCODE SCANNER
Found an item you love in store? Think you can get it cheaper? With our powerful barcode scanner,

=============================================================================

title: Forex Price Alerts
description:
A Forex trading tool that generates alerts when a pre-defined Forex price level is reached.

Ideal for technical traders waiting for key price levels to be reached.

Forex price alert triggers can be set on the bid or ask price. Uses Google's messaging service. The App doesn't need to be running in order to receive an alert. 


Features:

* REAL TIME STREAMING DATA - Uses a dedicated, reliable real-time Forex price feed.
* BID AND ASK TRIGGERS - Set a price trigger on either the Bid or Ask price.
* TOUCH-PAD ENTRY - Quickly set / Adjust price levels using swipe gestures.
* SORTING - Sort by trigger distance, symbol, or manually sort pending alerts
* SUPPORT FOR OREO's (8.0+) ADVANCED NOTIFICATION FEATURES 


Premium version:

* UNLIMITED ALERTS
* 30+ FOREX PAIRS - Including Metals and USD Index.
* CUSTOM TEXT MESSAGE - Describe what the alert means.
* LONG DURATION ALERTS SOUNDS


FAQ's

QUESTION: What's the difference between the Free and Premium version?

ANSWER: The Free version has less Forex pairs, and has a limited total number of pending alerts. However the Free version has no Ads, and uses the same real-time price feed and other features. The free version is fine if you mostly trade major Forex pairs and only require a few pending alerts at a time.


QUESTION: Can I make the alert sound a custom ringtone?

ANSWER: Yes, but only for Android 8.0 (Oreo) and above. Earlier versions of Android don't support ringtone tone sounds for notifications.

To add a custom ringtone notification sound, you'll first need to add your custom ringtone file to the downloads/notifications folder. Then go to the App's Settings / Sounds and select your custom ringtone from the list. Custom ringtones provide a way to create longer duration alert sounds.


QUESTION: Is the Forex price data real-time or delayed?

ANSWER: The Forex quotes are real-time, for both the free and premium versions. 


QUESTION: Does the App need to be running to receive an alert?

ANSWER: No. The App uses Google's messaging service. Our server continually checks your alerts and will send a notification message to your device if the trigger condition is reached.


QUESTION: I set an alert, but didn't receive a message when it was triggered.

ANSWER: There could be several reasons. Firstly, go to Android settings, and make sure that notifications are enabled for the App. Also make sure your device is not in a silent mode, and the volume isn't muted.

Messages are sent from Google's messaging server. If your device has poor signal quality, or the network connection between Google's servers and your device is disrupted for some reason, there's a chance the message won't be received.

So to ensure reliability, make sure your device has a stable internet connection, and is using a good quality ISP.


QUESTION: Does the App run in split screen mode

ANSWER: Yes.


If you have any problems, please contact us at support, and we'll help you out. To contact us, go to the App's menu and click "Contact Support"

title: Oil Price & News
description:
Just Updated -  5 stars ratings and applauded reviews, used by both oil and financial industry 
Finally a WTI oil price app that really works! 
Wait no more, Oil Price & News is free, and possibly the best app out there for your daily checks on crude oil prices and news.

You can easily check WTI Crude Oil, Brent Crude Oil & Natural Gas prices as the price and charts are frequently updated through out the day. Real world news and commentaries can be easily read and shared as well. 

NEW FEATURES
- Latest Twitter feeds focusing on #oilprice
- View our curated news through our Facebook post.
- Save articles and read later
- Enhanced sharing function for you to easily share articles or our app to your friends.

FEATURES:
- Intuitively designed and works on all screens
- Instant overview price summary of WTI Crude Oil, Brent Crude Oil and Natural Gas
- Get intraday, weekly and monthly candlestick charts up to 25 years
- Data and charts are updated hourly and daily
- Charts can be viewed in both portrait and landscape mode. They can also be zoom in and out too.
- Personally curated and up-to-date news feed from more than 10 quality oil and gas news sources. News sources include Reuters, Casey Research, Daily Energy Report, Energy Matters, Energy Post, Energy Trends Insider, Forbes, Google News, Jim Rogers' Commentaries, Marc Faber, Oil & Gas Investor, Platts, Rystad, WSJ, Yahoo News and ZeroHedge.

--------------------
May 27, 2019 - I would LOVE your feedback and suggestions!
- What areas of the app could I improve on?
- What new features would you like?
- How can I help make the app better?

title: Price Cam
description:
Price Cam
Use the camera to scan and convert prices in real time.

What does it do?
At the surface it's a simple but versatile currency converter. It can convert more than 150 currencies at the same time and has a handy built in calculator with history.

If you open the camera, it will use machine learning to scan, detect and convert prices automatically. No more typing on your part.

Perfect travel companion
If you are going on vacation or a business trip to another country, Price Cam will help you to quickly convert the prices using the most current exchange rates.

Exchange rates are updated automatically from openexchangerates.com when possible. New rates are available every 5 minutes.

Works offline
Traveling is fun but sometimes roaming costs are too high.

Price Cam can work when there is no internet connection. Just make sure to update the rates from time to time when you can.

Camera recognition uses on device models and does not require an active internet connection.

Features
• Supports over 150 currencies
• Built in calculator with history
• Scan prices with your camera
• Updates every 5 minutes
• Offline support
• Dark mode

Developed in Transylvania 🇷🇴

title: GoodRx Drug Prices and Coupons
description:
Save up to 80% on your prescription drug costs!

**GoodRx can save you hundreds of dollars a month, even if you have insurance or Medicare.**

Most Americans don't know that prescription prices vary wildly from pharmacy to pharmacy. There's never been a way to compare drug prices - until now. 

GoodRx makes comparing prescription drug prices easy. Our app provides current cash and sale prices, coupons and valuable savings tips for thousands of prescriptions at pharmacies near you. GoodRx tells you which pharmacies have drugs for less than $4 per fill, and some where certain prescriptions for free! 

Best of all, GoodRx coupons can be used from within the app - simply hand your phone to the pharmacist to save up to 80%! No need to print out anything - find savings on the go!

GoodRx is 100% free to use - there are no fees or obligations to you. You can use GoodRx for every member of your family, including pets.

GoodRx has been featured by Consumer Reports, The New York Times, PBS, ABC News, Forbes, CNN, The LA Times and more. Our app is used by hundreds of doctors and clinics to help save patients money on their medications.

GoodRx loves our reviews and may sometimes use them, in whole or edited form, in our marketing materials. Read our Terms of Use for more info.

By downloading GoodRx, you agree to be bound by our Terms Of Use. Read more at http://www.goodrx.com/terms-of-use 

Start saving on your prescriptions with GoodRx!

*GoodRx works to makes its apps accessible to all, including those with disabilities. If you are having difficulty accessing this application, please call or email us at (855) 268-2822 or ada@goodrx.com so that we can provide you with the services you require through alternative means.*

Advertising Notice:
https://support.goodrx.com/hc/en-us/articles/360026530331-Advertising-on-GoodRx

Notice of Collection:
https://support.goodrx.com/hc/en-us/articles/360037920971-California-Consumer-Privacy-Act-Privacy-Notice

recentChanges:
When we started GoodRx, we wanted our brand to be different with our yellow and black design.

But then, we created GoodRx Gold, our subscription service that unlocks even lower prices at pharmacies near you. GoodRx Gold has been shoved right inside the regular GoodRx app. You can now sign up and show your digital Gold card to a pharmacist. People may say “That’s not gold - it’s yellow!” They ain’t wrong.

Send tips, bugs, ironic things, or suggested color palettes to android@goodrx.com.
comments: What a wonderful app!! So happy with the prices. More than half the price of my insurance. I'm on Medicare and could not afford my prescriptions. I either had to do without or cut dose in half. It is so nice to have an alternative to the insurance and prescription drug companies that gouge prices just to line their pockets! Hopefully your app will cause some heartache to those theives who have been putting it to the little guy for decades. I recommend this app to everyone I know. Thank you again

Very helpful for saving money. Make sure you check with individual pharmacies before transferring your prescription. For instance, Fred Meyer will only let you fill ONE prescription. And once you've chosen that particular prescription, you cannot add another prescription to their "profile" at Fred Meyer. Even if you don't ever need refills again. Personally, I don't think they are living up to their arrangement with Good Rx, and should not be allowed to participate. But the app is TERRIFIC!

This app saved me more than half off of my first prescription. I would recommend this app to anyone that wants to save money on prescriptions. It is easy to use. I simply show the coupon from my phone to the pharmacist and that is it. Simple. I was a little worried that pharmacies would frown upon receiving a coupon and the added work to process. However, it appears to be seemless for them to enter as well and quick.

Great Application. Allows you to find stores near you with prices similar to having insurance. I couldn't believe the great prices and this is just with the GOOD RX App. You save even more for a current price of $5.99 a month with over a Thousand participating Pharmacies like Costco, CVS and more. Unfortunately Walgreens, Walmart and Sam's aren't on the Gold List but are on Standard Good RX card. Right now I just use the free version but soon will probably opt in on the RX Gold.

This is probably the easiest app I have ever used!!! They have saved my husband and i so much money. I stopped my prescription coverage thru medicare because they doubled. I take 3 pills a month and didnt need it. Then my husband had a hear attack. Goodrx saved us about $125 on all four of his subscriptions. 😊

title: WorthPoint Price Guide
description:
The WorthPoint Price Guide app provides collecting enthusiasts who like to roam with nearby shopping locations, current articles, and Worthopedia™ - the leading price guide for collectibles,  antiques, and art with over 480 million sales records from auction houses, marketplaces, and eBay®. (Worthopedia requires subscription; free trial offered.)

It’s the most reliable source for valuing items for selling or buying. The WorthPoint Price Guide app is especially well suited for those who need data on-the-go for venues like estate/garage sales; flea markets; auctions; and antique stores/malls. With a quick touch or two, you can locate the nearest shopping venue; obtain values and reference information on virtually any collectible item, and get up to the minute collectible news.   

The WorthPoint Price Guide app is from WorthPoint Corporation the global leader in value and reference information on art, antiques and collectibles.

summary: Research and value your antiques, collectibles, and art
recentChanges:
New and improved search bar
Additional bugs and fixes
comments: App and service don't offer a robust enough search engine. Simple keyword searches many times return all kinds of items not related to your search. No way to filter or be more specific. For example, search for Old Raby. It's an old hunt club. Searching for this returns everything from Rabies to Rabbis. In any other search engine, one could tighten this up by adding quotes around the search terms, but this search engine doesn't do that. It just returns the same results.

Typing into the search line is hopeless. The app randomly tells me I can't see the price because I don't have a subscription even though I'm logged in with a subscription. You need to do more beta testing before releasing an app that could potentially frustrate thousands of users. Worthpoint, if you know what is good for your business, put 10 people on fixing it today and you could be releasing a usable app within a week.
Breaks every other day. No contact form. Phone and snail mail only. Charges monthly fee but works only half the time. Amateur programming.
Wont let me sign in ever. Sucks because I have a paid subscription

App will never open. I'm a subscriber but can't use the app. Asks for login info then closes. Keep waiting for an update to correct this issue, but hasn't happened. Will keep using through my browser but it would be nice to have the app work. Update: found that the problem with signing in was related to a fingerprint signin issue. Bug that needs to be fixed.

title: Antique Price Guides
description:
AntiquesNavigator.com presents our free antiques and collectibles price guides.  Use our free guides to find the value of your antiques and collectibles or just browse the price guides and be envious of all the great antiques and collectibles sold in the past.   

Browse our numerous categories to find your antique values or use our search tool to narrow down your selection.   We have millions of antiques and collectibles in our database with real values and prices paid by actual collectors.   How often do you here, "Yeah, but did someone actually pay those prices or is it just up for sale at that price?"   This price guide consists of actual values paid by antique buyers and should help any collector place real values to their collection.

title: AppSales: Paid Apps Gone Free & On Sale
description:
AppSales offers an easy, convenient way to find and download the best apps and games on sale or free for a limited time. Personalize your experience with advanced filter options, monitor app prices and discover the latest sales and trending apps.

✔ *NEW* Discover paid apps that are free for a limited time

Google recently made it possible for developers to make their paid apps available for free for a short time which wasn’t possible before. Our new “Now Free” tab highlights those deals so you can grab those apps while the offer lasts. 

✔ App price monitoring has never been this easy!

Feature overview:
• Modern, intuitive user interface (Material 2.0 Design)
• Constantly updated list of sales
• Get notified about the new best sales on the Google Play Store and apps gone free
• Only the hottest apps, games, and wallpapers
• A price history provides transparency, allowing you to compare prices over time as well
• Dismiss apps you're not interested in
• Search for your new favorite apps and add them to your Watchlist
• Advanced filter options to personalize your experience
• Sync your Watchlist across multiple Android devices
• Share sales with your family and friends
• Dark Theme / Night mode

✔ Your Personal Watchlist
Add apps, games, and wallpapers to your personal Watchlist and receive a notification once the app goes on sale. 

✔ Price History
A Price History lets you easily view the min, the max, and the average price during the last 60 days (360 for Premium user). Validate sales and detect price-patterns to save money by purchasing an app at the best time, usually during a price drop on the Google Play Store.

✔ Watchlist Charts
Grouped into 3 sections (Last 48 hours, last 30 days and 1 Year) you can easily discover brand new trending apps or the most popular paid apps.

✔ Advanced Filter Options
Use filters to personalize the list of sales by defining your minimum discount-, download-, watchcount- and rating threshold. You can also choose to hide apps with ads or in-app purchases.

✔ Dismiss Apps
Dismiss apps you already own or you’re not interested in and they won’t show up the next time they are on sale.

✔ Categories
Not interested in apps of certain categories (e.g. Games or Wallpapers)? No problem, you can disable notifications for specific categories or completely hide them from your sale list. 

✔ Customizable Highlights Section
Set up filter, specify categories, blacklist certain app types and developers to get a list of sales you’re interested in.

Why Should I Download AppSales Best Apps On Sale? (tl;dr)
AppSales lets you discover the best apps and games on sale thanks to our advanced filter and customization options. Other functions, like a price monitor or Watchlist Charts, makes AppSales an all-in-one solution for apps gone free deals and offers.


Suggestions? Feedback? Leave us a comment or rating in the Google Play Store or contact us at: info@app-sales.net

Please note: Actual prices may vary depending on your location and currency.

comments: I like this app however missing sorting options(price or discount), group or filter to apps or games (if it is an option to do), discount tab shows 100% free ones as well which have separate tab. However still a better browsing experience than play store. Yes I found the filter on main tab which is pretty handy but it is far from ideal. Still a great app though.

I would like to have the option to receive notifications only about true free apps and games, and filter them for the most stared ones as well as the option to sort the apps by stars and by original price in order to filter the junk, unuseful apps. Noticed that not all of the apps on Google's Play store are searchable. Also, an AMOLED theme can never harm an app. I will update the review as soon as these crutial features get their way to the app and when you reply to me so I notice.

One of those very useful software applications in the apps store . I use it every day and it's quite addictive. I like the way you place your ads. Non obtrusive ethically placed ads. Now I'm using my phone like a Pro.!

Pre-Material dress-up was smooth/faster. Highlights- Now Free- Sales, bottom location, select option is close enough to Android navigation bar that it can be frustrating! "Material Design" bandwagon had done your app no favors.
The best app of its kind on Google Play. When I install others like this one I compare them to this one! Kudos to the developers for all of the $$ you have saved me!

title: Price comparison app - online shopping India
description:
At Price Kitna you can compare price, get cashback and coupons from top
online shopping stores like Amazon, Flipkart, Paytm mall, Myntra, Snapdeal,
and 200 other sites.
• Price comparison:- Compare prices of the same product from different
websites all at one place and get the best deal for yourself and save money.
• Cashback:- Get cashback on every purchase you make from price Kitna
app and get all the latest deals and coupons from all your favourite sites at
one place.
• Coupons:- Get the latest deals and coupons for your online shopping, use
the coupon and get an instant discount on your purchase. And make your
shopping experience awesome.
Why you should use Price Kitna app?
The biggest problem in online shopping today is the different prices of the
same product on different websites. Because there are so many apps and
websites today it's hard to get the best deal for yourself. And who wants to
scroll that much of websites to get best deals? Its time consuming and
irritating.
Here’s comes the role of price Kitna, we show all the prices of a product from
over 200 stores so you get the best price for your product at ease.
And you can also use coupons for shopping if available for the product you
want to buy to get an additional discount or rewards.
And at last anything, you buy from Price Kitna app or you just activate
cashback and shop from any of our partner apps or sites. You will get
additional cashback from price kitna. Which will be deposited on your price

bank account through upi or paytm, free charge balance.
That way you get the best online shopping experience for yourself from price

title: Price History - Shopping Tool for china Shops
description:
AliHistory is a shopping tool for Aliexpress, which will help you to buy products at historically lowest prices. Our goal is to provide you additional information about each product on Aliexpress.

The biggest benefits of the application are:

★ Price history - The price graph will show you the price changes for the last 3-6 months. Be careful about fake discounts and rather check the price history of items before purchase.

★ Seller rating - For each product, you will find a list of negative and positive facts about the seller. We recommend shopping only from verified sellers.

★ Price drop notification - Notification will be sent to your device, once the price of the selected product decreases. We will watch the price for you.


How to use AliHistory:

1. In AliHistory, click on “Open Aliexpress”
2. Choose the product you like
3. See price history and seller rating

descriptionHTML:
AliHistory is a shopping tool for Aliexpress, which will help you to buy products at historically lowest prices. Our goal is to provide you additional information about each product on Aliexpress.

The biggest benefits of the application are:

★ Price history - The price graph will show you the price changes for the last 3-6 months. Be careful about fake discounts and rather check the price history of items before purchase.

★ Seller rating - For each product, you will find a list of negative and positive facts about the seller. We recommend shopping only from verified sellers.

★ Price drop notification - Notification will be sent to your device, once the price of the selected product decreases. We will watch the price for you.


How to use AliHistory:

1. In AliHistory, click on “Open Aliexpress”
2. Choose the product you like
3. See price history and seller rating
4. Decide, if you buy the item now or wait for a better price
5. Add product to AliHistory and select interval, how often you receive notifications about the price drop.

You can use the same tool in your computer. Learn how to add to your browser (Chrome, Mozilla, Opera):
https://www.alimaniac.com/aliexpress-articles/39-history-and-price-comparator-on-aliexpress/

Important: Please read our Terms of usage on our website before using this application.
summary: Price history, seller rating, price drop notification
recentChanges: Price updates and notification has been reviewed and fixed

comments: Don't download unless you want to wait weeks for a payment. They should have never changed it to card number. It takes well over a week now when the old way was just a day or two. It's better to just use the discount from gas station cards now. It's a shame because this has potential. Edit: Why do u say contact ur email when u don't respond? I made this purchase March 5. Contacted March 16. Just to get a email on March 21 saying to provide proof of purchase. Obviously card check in doesn't work

I like the app. I can't wait till I can use it at some grocery stores and restaurants in my area! Update, I've been using the app for several months now and I have actually gotten a fair amount of money back. But I have also encountered a lot of errors or glitches which have caused me to not get credit for MANY purchases. I tried sending a message today. We'll see how that goes. And the recent switch to the pre registered or check in system lends more confusion to me than service. Almost great.

so far this app is great made almost $30 in less than a month. I have not cashed it out yet so I don't know how smooth that part is but I'm extremely happy to be getting paid for something I do every day. "Update" Well apparently if you change cards through your bank or use your a friend's/family members card. I was up to $340 and I'm locked out indefinitely. Just try not to make too much money and you guys should be fine.

Used to be perfect until a couple days ago. Now all of a sudden when I try to upload my receipt, whether I take a picture of it or upload it from galley, the app crashes. It used to work perfectly fine up until for me, March 14th and now I can't even upload my receipt. Please fix this immediately so I can start saving again!

This app works like advertised. After you claim your offer, you pay full price at the pump and then get a reward once you upload your receipt. They are working on no longer needing to upload your receipt, just check in and use a past card. It all depends on where you live, but where I live, there are a good number of gas stations that are competitively (within 1 -2 cents) of the stations around them. Highly recommend.

title: Sale Price: eBay Selling Price & Profit Calculator
description:
Sale Price calculates your selling price using eBay & PayPal Fees, item cost, postage and others to guarantee the profit margin you need.

No need to guess your eBay selling price anymore! Sale Price includes fields to change your eBay & PayPal fees according to what you pay. Sale Price works by calculating the fixed costs like eBay listing fee, as well as percentage costs such as eBay category fees and outputs a selling price that will earn you X% profit margin.

No worries if you already have a fixed selling price, Sale Price can tell you your profit margin and the fixed profit you are making on eBay already! 

Sale Price gives you a breakdown of all your fees so you know exactly where your money is going! This helps you make the most profit from the items you list on eBay.

Selling items on eBay can be stressful with multiple costs (including PayPal). Sale Price takes the stress away by keeping track of your fees/costs and help you list your items on eBay faster and with more confidence!

Sale Price includes a helpful tool to fill out your UK & USA category fees automatically! Just search for your category and Sale Price  will fill out the percentage fee for that eBay category!

Features:
        •  Calculate your selling price using profit margin.
 	•  Calculate your profit margin using selling price.
 	•  Automatically add your category fees for UK and USA
 	•  View a breakdown of all eBay & PayPal fees
 	•  Add multiple fields such as:
    • eBay category fee
    • eBay listing fee
    • PayPal percentage fee
    • PayPal fixed fee
    • Item cost
    • Postage costs
    • Extra costs
    • Selling Price
    • Profit Margin
 	• All fields can be customized to your liking.
 	• Change currency to fit your county.

Pro Features:
        •  All of the above!
 	•  Ability to save templates for all your fields.
 	•  Load different templates to suit your calculation.
 	•  View the history of all your calculations.
 	•  Pin important calculations for later use.
 	•  Remove all ads.

Although Sale Price is targeted for eBay users, Amazon users can also use this formula by replacing 'eBay category fee' with the appropriate fee for Amazon categories.

Idea is not new but kudos for making an app. However the design of the app defeats the purpose - speed. You just need to have 4 boxes that will be used for input or output of information depending on which of the 3 boxes are filled in. All the other stuff should be in settings or below if you like. I have made in excel and loading it on the phone and using takes way less time than this app. Make the extra expenses optionally as %. You also need add local taxes - shipping & puchase price.
